item.title: thesis_metadata
item.description: intro recently submitted phd i wish i had set this up earlier (i.e., when I started), but in the middle of my second year (by which point iâ€™d written some stuff already), i thought it would be fun to track my word count. - honestly, it was more just a procrastination aid one morning having submitted recently, i figured that the numbers will likely not change any more, so here we are.
